alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Mills; Montgomery; Page; Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 9:38PM CDT until May 30 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Fremont County in southwestern Iowa... Southwestern Montgomery County in southwestern Iowa... Mills County in southwestern Iowa... Southern Pottawattamie County in southwestern Iowa... Northwestern Page County in southwestern Iowa... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 937 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles west of Tabor, or 15 miles northeast of Nebraska City, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Randolph around 945 PM CDT. Malvern around 955 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Emerson, Hastings and Henderson. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 12 and 32. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southwestern Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
